about_the_game:
Duriano is an exhilaratin 3D top-down action rogue-lite game that plunges you into the mythical world of Norse mythology. Take on the role of a heroic durian, wielding powerful weapons and divine abilities to vanquish the gods of Asgard.

Durian Hero Variants

Choose from a variety of durian heroes, each embodying the essence of a Norse god or mythical creature.
Each variant offers unique abilities and playstyles, influencing your strategic approach to combat and exploration.

Fate's Favors & God Path

Enhance your hero's capabilities with divine gifts known as Fate's Favors, providing buffs and unique powers.
Select from specific God Trails tied to Norse gods, unlocking unique combat skills and abilities that tailor your playstyle.

Mythic Weapons

Discover and wield an array of mythical weapons, each with distinct attributes and effects.
Fuse weapons with your hero's abilities and Fate's Favors to create powerful combinations and dominate your enemies.

Synergistic Combos

Experiment with combining different hero variants, Fate's Favors, and weapons to discover synergistic combos.
Master these combinations to overcome challenging enemies, hordes, and formidable bosses.

Adaptive Strategy

Experience the dynamic rogue-lite gameplay where each run presents new environments, enemies, and challenges.
Make strategic decisions on-the-fly, adapting your build to the ever-changing threats and opportunities.

Progression and Customization

Unlock new durian variants, Fate's Favors, and weapons as you progress, expanding your arsenal and strategic options.
Invest in permanent upgrades, refining your divine arsenal and enhancing your hero's capabilities for future runs.

Prepare for Battle

Dive into the mystical realms of Norse mythology and prepare for an epic journey filled with action, strategy, and endless replayability. Harness the power of the gods, create devastating combos, and lead your durian hero to victory against the gods of Asgard.
Are you ready to embrace your fate and become the ultimate durian hero? Join the fight in Duriano and carve your legend in the annals of Asgardian history!

Story

In Asgard, Odin foresees Ragnarok, the end of the gods. To delay this fate, he banishes Hela, daughter of Loki, to Helheim. Enraged, Loki unleashes chaos across the Nine Realms.

As Durian, a warrior chosen by Hela, you must journey through the realms of Norse mythology, facing legendary gods and monsters. Collect powerful weapons and abilities, overcome trials, and determine the fate of Asgard. Will you side with darkness or light in the final battle?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 11.0 (Big Sur) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 Chip
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 integrated GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Designed for 30 FPS gameplay at 720p resolution
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 (Monterey) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 Chip
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 integrated GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 60 FPS gameplay at 1080p resolution

name: Duriano

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Designed for 30 FPS gameplay at 720p resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6GB or AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 60 FPS gameplay at 1080p resolution

short_description: Duriano is a top-down arena shooting Slasher roguelike game where the player will be a hero durian of the norse wielding a weapon to fight upon a god of norse mythology. From different weapons, Durian hero, God’s trail, items will lead the player to create a build and defeat all gods of asgard.
